column1: In  the  absence  of  any  evidence  that  would  have  any  bearing  in  regard  to  the
ques(cid:415)on of reinstatement, such as whether or not the Appellant has got himself
gainfully  employed  elsewhere  during  the  pendency  of  the  appeals  to  the  High
Court and to this Court, I hold that it would be just and equitable to reinstate the
Appellant  in  service  as  an  Engineer  (Grade  III)  in  the  Respondent  Bureau  with
